div.a: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1532 Homs (anc. Emesa), Seleucis, 1934 (488) Burial: c. 210 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 60 AR. Pot hoard Alexander III: 1 late post. tetradr.
